data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Tomaszewska, Wioletta, Szawaryn, Karol (2013): Revision of the Asian species of Afidentula Kapur, 1958 (Coleoptera: Coccinellidae: Epilachnini). Zootaxa 3608 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3608.1.2
